name: Scorch Drake
description: The Scorch Drake is a large dragon with formidable physical defenses and a fiery presence, capable of maneuvering effectively in combat with its wings.
memorable: Its ability to create visual distortions and unleash devastating fire breath make it a dangerous foe.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush and overwhelm foes with fiery attacks.
relations: May be encountered alongside other dragons or fire elemental creatures.
environment: Fiery environments such as volcanic areas or regions with considerable heat.
strengths: Good mobility, capable of stealth with its Heat Shimmer ability, and devastating fire breath attacks.
weaknesses: Below average intellect may limit strategic options in combat.
attacks: Multiattack that includes a Bite dealing piercing and fire damage and Claw attacks that deal slashing and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, allowing it to unleash a cone of liquid fire that ignites enemies, causing ongoing damage.
senses: Has a keen perception with a passive score of 15.
skills: Demonstrates proficiency in Wisdom-based Perception checks, enhancing its stealth capabilities.
additional_information: Creates illusions with Heat Shimmer to hinder foes' perception.
Inflicts fire damage with its Scalding Blood ability when attacked.
Can blind ignited foes with Fan the Flames ability.
Uses stealth and mobility to navigate combat effectively.
Present a significant threat to lower-level adventurers.
test_queries: monster that blinks in and out of sight
dragon that ignites attackers in melee
